publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5991 Angela Constance: Focus on Mental Health Issuesâ€”That the Parliament recognises the efforts of Ms Elizabeth Mackay and Ms Nicola Richardson in working to publish Focus magazine for the users of the charity, Penumbra, in the Livingston constituency, which supports West Lothian community members with mental health issues; commends the inclusive nature of Focus, which actively engages and involves community members and service users of Penumbra with informational newsletters, facts and events; strongly supports the efforts of Ms Richardson and Ms Mackay to spread awareness about mental health issues in the West Lothian community, and wishes Focus a long and successful run.
